name: Hoang Gia Hotel Cau Giay
address: Alley No.92, Hoang Ngan, Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Hoang Gia Hotel Cau Giay, located in Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Hanoi, is a popular choice for travelers. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

At Hoang Gia Hotel Cau Giay, the excellent service and superior facilities make for an unforgettable stay. Top features of the hotel include car hire.

Step into one of 21 inviting rooms and escape the stresses of the day with a wide range of amenities such as mirror, towels, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), toiletries which can be found in some rooms. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. When you are looking for comfortable and convenient accommodations in Hanoi, make Hoang Gia Hotel Cau Giay your home away from home.
